name: Word Warrior (TheBreakfast)
description:
Word Warrior is a Comedy JRPG made in Unity. Why not RPG Maker you ask? Because we're big ol' dumb dumbs and decided to reinvent the wheel. But, as far as re-invented wheels go, our's isn't so bad for 3 days of work.

In Word Warrior, you have a dictionary of about 225 nouns that you can transform into. Each word has a comedic result that gets displayed. The dictionary is taken primarily from the list of 2000 most common nouns, video game tropes, and some fun words.

Otherwise, it's a typical JRPG. You encounter random battles, and you can even level up. Wild!

Tips:

Try not to use proper nouns. Think of things.

Think of simple words like: "Town, Teacher, School, Man, Woman, Car, Truck, Party, Wolf"

There are some fun words too. Try typing in your star sign, the names of the planets, the days of the week, or the last names of certain politicians.

If you're stuck, here is the complete list of available words. Try it first without reading from the list.

Art and Overworld/Cutscene code by: Marcio Miranda

Battle system & Menu code by: Jake Carewick

Music:

"Cyborg Ninja" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
